Bar

Bar

  • Menu R1
  • Menu R2

The bar is a responsive component that is able to serve a variety of navigation elements, links, buttons, search boxes and whiskey. Ok, maybe not whiskey.

Transparent by default, but more variations may be provided in a later release.

The bar itself is divided into three sections, bar-section-left, bar-section-center and bar-section-right, which align left, center and right. Because that made the most sense.

These sections can be used all at once, but don't specifically need to.

.nav-top is a derivative of this .bar component.

  • Menu R2
